home.headline: Welcome to
home.subline: Discover the job that really suits you with our career orientation test.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Choose between light and dark mode

R.name: Realistic
R.description: People with a Realistic personality type are often practical, hands-on, and enjoy working with tools, machines, or animals. They prefer to work in environments that are concrete and tangible.

I.name: Investigative
I.description: Investigative individuals are analytical, curious, and enjoy solving complex problems. They often prefer to work in scientific or technical fields.

A.name: Artistic
A.description: Artistic individuals are creative, imaginative, and often express themselves through art, music, or writing. They prefer to work in unstructured environments that allow for self-expression.

S.name: Social
S.description: Social individuals are empathetic, caring, and enjoy helping others. They often prefer to work in environments that involve interaction with people.

E.name: Enterprising
E.description: Enterprising individuals are persuasive, ambitious, and enjoy leading others. They often prefer to work in business or entrepreneurial environments.

C.name: Conventional
C.description: Conventional individuals are organized, detail-oriented, and enjoy working with data and systems. They often prefer to work in structured environments that involve following rules and procedures.

services.title: Services
services.description: Solutions to support you in your career

careerMatching.title: Career matching
careerMatching.subtitle: Find your career path in just a few clicks
careerMatching.riasecDescription: The RIASEC model is a career development theory that helps individuals understand their interests and how they relate to different types of careers. It identifies six major interest types: Realistic, Investigative, Artistic, Social, Enterprising, and Conventional.
careerMatching.description: Find the job thatâ€™s right for you through a simple, personalized journey that analyzes your personality, skills, and aspirations to suggest the most suitable career opportunities.
careerMatching.questionnaireDescription: Whatâ€™s your feeling about this activity? Tap the emoji that feels right to you!
careerMatching.question: Question
careerMatching.reviewDescription: Click on any question to review it.

step1.title: Welcome to your career orientation test
step1.description:
This test can help you discover your interests and how they relate to the world of work. It can give you ideas about which careers might suit you.

When the test begins, click an emoji to answer each question. You can use the Back button anytime to change your answers.

step2.title: How does it work?
step2.description:
The test includes {questions_count} questions about professional activities that some people do as part of their job.

Read each question carefully and choose how you feel about each type of work using the emojis below:

step3.title: Ready to start?
step3.description: Try NOT to think about: - Whether you have enough education or training to do the work. - How much money you would make doing the work. Just focus on this: Would you like or dislike doing the work? And take your time answering the questions â€” thereâ€™s no need to rush!

results.matchesDescription: These are the careers that best match your profile.
results.noMatches: No careers match your profile at the moment.
